H0.text: Founded in 1775, George Washington was the Commander-in-Chief of what Army. American Revolutionary Army

H1.text: Founded in 1775, George Washington was the Commander-in-Chief of what Army. Colonial Forces

H2.text: Founded in 1775, George Washington was the Commander-in-Chief of what Army. Liberty Army

H3.text: Founded in 1775, George Washington was the Commander-in-Chief of what Army. Continental Army

A4.text: On June 15, 1775, Congress unanimously elected George Washington commander-in-chief of the Continental Army.
